page.description: A friendly name for the Namespace used in Local Storage for the component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Namespace friendly name]* is a human-readable or "friendly" version of the of the Namespace name (defined by the [Namespace property].) For example, "Expenses App" The friendly name is stored in the *[js:ALPHA_<Namespace>._INFO]* key in Local Storage for the UX Component. The friendly name is useful to help identify the set of data in Local Storage. *[js:<Namespace>]* is the value defined in the *[ui:Namespace property]*.
